faq-one-title: How to order food from your website?
faq-one-content: To order food, simply visit our website, select a menu item, choose your favorite dish and add to cart. Then, fill in the necessary information and select a payment method to complete the order.
faq-two-title: How long is the delivery time?
faq-two-content: Delivery times usually depend on your location and traffic conditions. We try to deliver as quickly as possible, usually 30 minutes to 1 hour after ordering.
faq-three-title: How to check my order status?
faq-three-content: You can check the status of your order by logging into your account on the website. Then, visit My Orders to see detailed information about your order and its current status.
faq-four-title: Can I cancel an order after it has been placed?
faq-four-content: You can cancel your order before it has been confirmed and preparations have begun. However, once an order has begun to be processed, you may need to contact us for further details regarding order cancellation.
faq-five-title: How do I change my order after it has been placed?
faq-five-content: If you need to make changes to your order, including adding or removing items, please contact our customer service as soon as possible. We will try to fulfill your request.
faq-six-content: Yes, there may be a small delivery fee depending on your location and total order value. This fee helps us ensure on-time and quality delivery service.
